title: EmailThread — Northstar / Riverbend — Marketing — 2025-08-13
all_text:
Subject: LOI terms: earn-out + exclusivity
Date: 2025-08-13 16:15
From: Maya Chen <maya@northstar.example>
To: Noah Bennett, Devon Price
Cc: Kara Whitman

Hi Noah,

Thanks for the call earlier. Below are a few items to keep momentum.
- Customer concentration: requesting documents.
- Regulatory certifications: flagging a potential issue.
- Synergy model: requesting documents.
- Sales pipeline and channel partners: proposing a working session.
- Employee retention and option pool: seeking clarification.
- Cybersecurity posture and incident history: proposing a working session.
Please route questions through the diligence tracker to keep responses auditable.
Initial valuation range assumes 6.0–7.5x forward ARR, adjusted for hardware gross margin
volatility.

Best,
Maya Chen
CEO
Northstar
